rehurttime.configuration.title: ReHurtTime Configuration
rehurttime.configuration.bypassesInvulne: Determines whether the invulnerability bypass mechanic is enabled.

Defines which types of damage can bypass the invulnerability period.
See the configuration file for details on the expression API.
rehurttime.configuration.appliesKnockbac: Determines whether damage that bypasses invulnerability can still apply knockback.

Defines which types of damage can still apply knockback when bypassing invulnerability.
See the configuration file for details on the expression API.
rehurttime.configuration.logEnabled.tool: Outputs detailed damage information to the log for debugging purposes.
rehurttime.configuration.logFunction.too:
Defines the content of log outputs, can return a HashMap to customize the log output format.
See the configuration file for details on the expression API.
